name: headhunter
description: Headhunter: 1pt for each enemy Character that is destroyed.

name: kingslayer
description: *Kingslayer: 1 point for every 2 wounds to enemy character non-monster or vehicle and 1 point for every 4 wounds to character with vehicle or monster keyword.

name: markedForDeath
description: *Marked for Death: Choose 4 of your opponent’s units with a Power Level of 7+. Earn 1 pt for each of these units destroyed.

name: bigGameHunter
description: *Big Game Hunter: 1 point for every enemy model with the Monster or Vehicle keyword and 7+ wounds destroyed.

name: titanSlayer
description: *Titan Slayers: For every 8 wounds lost by enemy units with the Titanic keyword in total throughout the course of the game, earn 1 point.

name: reaper
description: The Reaper: For every 20 enemy models destroyed, earn 1 point.

name: recon
description: Recon: Have a unit at least partially in each table quarter at the end of your player turn.

name: behindEnemyLines
description: Behind Enemy Lines: If at least one of your units is wholly in the enemy Deployment Zone at the start of your turn, earn 1 Point.

name: butchersBill
description: The Butcher’s Bill: Destroy 2+ enemy units during a player turn to earn 1 Point.

name: groundControl
description: Ground Control: Earn 1 point for each objective held at the end of the last Battle Round played.

name: oldSchool
description: Old School: Earn 1 point for the following: First Strike, Slay the Warlord, Linebreaker, Last Strike
